LITURGY.TROPARION: By Your cross You destroyed death; You opened Paradise to the thief; You changed the lamentation of the myrrh-bearers to joy, and charged the apostles to proclaim that You are risen, O Christ our God, offering great mercy to the world.
LITURGY.KONTAKION: No longer shall the dominion of death be able to hold humanity, for Christ went down shattering and destroying it s powers. Hades is bound. The prophets exult with one voice. The Saviour has come for those with faith, saying: “Come forth, O faithful, to the resurrection!”
